scripts.build: pnpm --filter ./packages/shared run build && pnpm --filter ./packages/fetch-wrapper run build && pnpm --filter ./apps/api run build && pnpm api:generate && pnpm --filter ./apps/web run build
scripts.api:generate: pnpm --filter ./packages/shared run build && pnpm --filter ./apps/api run api:generate
scripts.dev: pnpm api:generate && pnpm db:start && pnpm db:init && pnpm run -r --parallel --aggregate-output dev
scripts.start:prod: cd apps/api && pnpm db:deploy && pnpm start
